Author: Neil Bird [Msft]
Summary: PowerShell script to automate identifying "Orphaned Disks" in an Azure subscription. An Orphaned Disk is a Disk that does NOT have an "Active Lease" (Unmanaged Disks) or does NOT have a "ManagedBy" property set to a VM (Managed Disks). The script outputs  information to a log fil
Title: Azure - Identify and Optionally Delete Orphaned Disks
